forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: creating a custom board

comments.text: when you hit "create board" you can create a new board, findable by others.
to add a custom color and shape of the board, click on "..." on the board, then "create board dialog".
once the custom shape is created, go to that dialog again, and context-laser your board placement. it is now used for the board.
(the centerpiece large board shape is non-deletable in custom board creations, so that all the interface can still fit.)

thread.latestCommentText: (the centerpiece large board shape is non-deletable in custom board creations, so that all the interface can still fit.)
